name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Tab Refresher with Cache Clear, Click, and Scroll

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-Refresh enhances your browsing experience by automating page refreshes with customizable options. Set your page to refresh atâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto-Refresh enhances your browsing experience by automating page refreshes with customizable options. Set your page to refresh at intervals between 5 seconds and 5 minutes, or choose a random interval between 50 and 100 seconds. The extension also includes features to clear your cache.
Here are the key features:
Customizable Refresh Intervals: Choose specific intervals or let the extension select a random interval between 50 and 100 seconds.
Cache Clearing: Automatically clear your browser cache to ensure you always view the latest content.
